title: What to Expect at Builder Meetups
description: Learn about the format, structure, and atmosphere of Builder Vancouver meetups.

sections.title: Meetup Format
sections.body: Our meetups typically run 2-3 hours and include a mix of presentations, hands-on activities, and networking. We start with introductions, followed by the main content, and end with open discussion and collaboration time.

sections.title: Typical Schedule
sections.body:
6:00 PM - Doors open, networking
6:30 PM - Welcome and introductions
6:45 PM - Main presentation or workshop
7:45 PM - Break
8:00 PM - Open discussion / hands-on time
8:30 PM - Wrap up

sections.title: Level of Technical Depth
sections.body: We cater to all skill levels. Presentations include context for beginners while diving deep enough to engage experienced developers. Don't worry if you don't understand everything - questions are encouraged and learning is collaborative.

sections.title: What to Bring
sections.body: Yourself and your curiosity! For workshop sessions, bring a laptop. Having a Bitcoin wallet (mobile or hardware) can be useful but isn't required. We'll provide any other materials needed.

sections.title: Atmosphere
sections.body: Expect a casual, friendly environment focused on learning and building. People are genuinely excited to share knowledge and help each other. Don't be shy - introduce yourself and ask questions!

meta.title: What to Expect | Builder Vancouver
meta.description: Learn about Builder Vancouver meetup format, schedule, and atmosphere. Know what to bring and what to expect.
